title.en: Polish for Beginners I (on the Basis of English), Level 0 > A1.2
title.et: Poola keel algajatele I (inglise keele baasil), tase 0 > A1.2

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
The initial stage of complex studying of the Polish language (the basic knowledge on phonetics, morphology and lexicon, reading of texts and purchase of elementary colloqual and written skills).

Main discussion topics:
1. introducing yourself
2. basic communication phrases
3. names of objects, animals, plants
4. family
5. hobby
6. in a restaurant
7. shopping
8. time
9. polish holidays in autumn and winter

Main grammar issues:
1. conjugations
2. present and past tense forms
3. modal verbs
4. declination (nominative, genitive, accusative, instrumental)
5. numerals
description.et: Kompleksne poola keele algkursus (ülevaade foneetikast, morfoloogiast ja sõnavarast, tekstide kugemine ning elementaarse kõne- ning kirjutamisoskuse omandamine).

objectives.en: To give students the basic information about Polish language, its phonetics, morphology and lexicon, to develop skills of pronunciation and reading.
objectives.et: Anda üliõpilastele üldteadmised poola keelest, ülevaade poola keele foneetikast, morfoloogiast ja sõnavarast; arendada hääldamis- ning lugemisoskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: The student, who passed the first part of the course of Polish language (A1.2), acquires initial knowledge of the language, expands the knowledge of features of other slavic languages.
learning_outcomes.et: Õppeaine esimest osa läbinud üliõpilasel on algteadmised poola keelest (A1.2), laiendatud teadmised slaavi keeleruumi eripärast.

grade_evaluation.et:
1) participation in seminars
2) homework
3) Two control tests
4) exam

resources.mandatory_materials: Malolepsza M., Szymkiewicz A., 2002 HURRA! PO POLSKU 1
